desc: SwapEnt-LowFreq is a sub-transformation method from EntitySwap which replace entities in text with random same typed entities with low frequency.

examples.ori: Fudan University is located in Shanghai Yangpu area.
examples.trans: Publication House of Vandebilt is located in Shanghai Yangpu area.

examples.ori: The situation is very serious, matthias, 30, told reporters after meeting with ban in New York
examples.trans: The situation is very serious, Jedi Luis Fontage Alexander, 30, told reporters after meeting with ban in New York
